name: Snake Hit Block - Crush Colors
description:
Snake Hit Block is a classic and exciting brick game. Relive the thrill of the sensational classic! This brick game help reminds you of your childhood. Just play Snake Hit Block to relax your brain and get fun. The game is funny and challenging.

Swipe left and right, manipulate the baffle, bounce a snake consisting of small balls, and constantly bounce and hit the bricks!
As the bricks fall, try to adjust the angle, collect more balls, let the snake grow longer and break all the bricks!

Game features:
- Free to play
- Simple swipe control
- Swipe to move the bar and bounce the snake.
- Make a longer snake to strengthen attack power.
- Opportunity to unlock new types of snakes, Collect various snakes.
- Endless gameplay
- Rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore

Enjoy!
